oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Margaret Tappan Thomas Collins letter
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Margaret Tappan Thomas Collins
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: June 30, 1925 from Margaret Tappan Thomas Collins, Glacier National Park, to her family, the E.L. Thomas Family, Appalachian Club, Elkmont, TN. ALS 3 page letter plus envelope. Mentions rainy weather, Delta Delta Delta (Tri Delt) Sorority.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Rain; Fraternities & sororities;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
